alert.note: Alert for Chase (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHASE COUNTY... At 425 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Cottonwood Falls, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Elmdale, Hymer, Tallgrass Prairie and Tallgrass Prairie Preserve. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
